column1: Appendix table 2. Standard errors for table 2: Population-adjusted percent of prisoners arrested for a new crime within 3 years following release in 12 states in 1994 and 2005, by demographic characteristics and most serious commitment offense
Report title: Recidivism of Prisoners Released in 30 States in 2005: Patterns from 2005 to 2010
Data source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Recidivism of State Prisoners Released in 1994 and 2005 data collections
Authors: Matthew R. Durose, Alexia D. Cooper, Ph.D., and Howard N. Snyder, Ph.D

Appendix table 2. Standard errors for table 2: Population-adjusted percent of prisoners arrested for a new crime within 3 years following release in 12 states in 1994 and 2005, by demographic characteristics and most serious commitment offense
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Recidivism of State Prisoners Released in 1994 and 2005 data collections.
